String: Oath Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance Iron Will is in effect, which increases enmity.
You can view the job gauge description at any time from the Actions & Traits menu.
Oath Gauge

The Oath Gauge displays the current strength of a paladin's oath, which increases as auto-attacks are performed. A strong oath is required to execute several select actions such as Sheltron, Cover (acquired at level 45), and Intervention (acquired at level 62), and will grow weaker upon using them. Using certain actions will increase the Oath Gauge.
Beast Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance Defiance is in effect, which increases enmity.
Beast Gauge

The Beast Gauge displays the current strength of a warrior's wrath. This animalistic rage is required to execute several select actions such as Inner Beast and Steel Cyclone (acquired at level 45) and will grow weaker upon using them. Using certain actions will increase the Beast Gauge.
Blood Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance Grit is in effect, which increases enmity.
Darkside Gauge
This timer indicates the duration of Darkside, which increases damage dealt. Using Flood of Darkness or Edge of Darkness (acquired at level 40) grants Darkside.
Blood Gauge

The Blood Gauge displays the amount of Blackblood a dark knight has accumulated. Blackblood can be consumed to execute actions such as Bloodspiller and Quietus (acquired at level 64). Using certain actions will increase the Blood Gauge.
Darkside Gauge

This symbol indicates that the Dark Arts effect has been granted. This occurs when the barrier applied by the action The Blackest Night has absorbed the full amount of damage. Flood of Darkness and Edge of Darkness can be performed by consuming Dark Arts instead of MP while the effect is active.
Darkside Gauge
When executing Living Shadow, a second timer indicating its duration will appear.
Healing Gauge

The Healing Gauge displays the current number of Lilies a white mage has accumulated. Lilies are accumulated as time passes while engaged in combat. Lilies are consumed by using the actions Afflatus Solace and Afflatus Rapture (acquired at level 76).
Healing Gauge
Performing actions that consume Lilies will also nourish the Blood Lily. The Blood Lily will bloom after consuming three Lilies, allowing the execution of Afflatus Misery.
Aetherflow Gauge
Using the action Aetherflow fills the Aetherflow Gauge, which is required to use certain actions.
Faerie Gauge

The Faerie Gauge displays the current amount of fae aether accumulated within a faerie. Fae aether is accumulated by using actions such as Lustrate and Excogitation in combat, depleting the Aetherflow Gauge. Maintaining an Aetherpact consumes fae aether.
Faerie Gauge
Using the action Summon Seraph replaces Eos with Seraph. The Faerie Gauge will indicate how much time remains before she must return.
Arcana Gauge
Using the actions Astral Draw or Umbral Draw will replace Play I, Play II, and Play III with their respective arcanum, which will be represented in the Arcana Gauge.
Divination and Arcana Gauges
Using the action Astral Draw will replace Minor Arcana with Lord of Crowns, while Umbral Draw will replace it with Lady of Crowns.
Chakra Gauge

The Chakra Gauge indicates the number of chakra a monk currently has opened. Chakra are opened using actions such as Steeled Meditation, or by using certain weaponskills. Opening five allows for the execution of Steel Peak and Howling Fist (acquired at level 40).
Beast Chakra Gauge

Executing certain weaponskills will open Beast Chakra─Opo-opo Chakra, Coeurl Chakra, or Raptor Chakra─in accordance with the form normally required to execute them. After opening three, you will be able to execute one of several powerful actions. Three distinct Beast Chakra allow the execution of Flint Strike, three of the same allow the execution of Elixir Field, and two distinct chakra with a third repeating one allow the execution of Celestial Revolution. It is also possible to open the Lunar Nadi and Solar Nadi by executing Elixir Field and Flint Strike respectively. Opening three Beast Chakra and both nadi allows the execution of Tornado Kick.
Lightning Gauge

The action Brotherhood grants the effect Meditative Brotherhood to you and nearby party members, increasing the frequency with which you open chakra. Moreover, you can open up to ten chakra so long as you are under this effect.
Dragon Gauge
This timer indicates the duration of Blood of the Dragon, which increases damage dealt. Using Geirskogul grants Blood of the Dragon.
Dragon Gauge

Upon learning the trait Lance Mastery IV, the actions Raiden Thrust and Draconian Fury can be executed to sharpen the Firstminds' Focus, up to a maximum of 2 units. Once their focus is fully sharpened, you can execute Wyrmwind Thrust.
Kazematoi
Using the action Armor Crush as part of a combo grants stacks of Kazematoi, represented by this gauge. Up to five stacks can be stored, and are used to increase the potency of Aeolian Edge.
Ninki Gauge

The Ninki Gauge displays the current amount of Ninki a ninja has accumulated. Ninki slowly builds inside a ninja's body when certain weaponskills are performed and can be used to execute special ninjutsu such as Hellfrog Medium and Bhavacakra (acquired at level 68).
Sen Gauge

The Sen Gauge displays which of the 3 Sen effects─Setsu (top), Getsu (left), and Ka (right)─are currently accumulated. Sen is required to perform Iaijutsu, the number of Sen accumulated determining which weaponskill will be executed─1 for Higanbana, 2 for Tenka Goken, and 3 for Midare Setsugekka.
Kenki Gauge

The Kenki Gauge displays the current amount of Kenki a samurai has accumulated. Kenki slowly builds in a samurai's blade through the successful execution of weaponskills or Third Eye. Kenki is required to execute special devastating attacks such as Hissatsu: Shinten, Hissatsu: Gyoten (acquired at level 54), Hissatsu: Guren (acquired at level 70), and more.
Song Gauge

Singing Mage's Ballad will display the action's corresponding Song Gauge, indicating the effect's time remaining. If the Repertoire effect is triggered while Mage's Ballad is being sung, the recast times for Bloodletter and Rain of Death (learned at level 45) are reduced.
“詩心”は「ベノムバイト/コースティックバイト」、「ウィンドバイト/ストームバイト」による継続ダメージの命中時に一定確率で発動します。戦歌を使い、詩心を付与させていくことで吟遊詩人の攻撃力を高めることができます。

Singing Army's Paeon will display the action's corresponding Song Gauge, indicating the effect's time remaining. If the Repertoire effect is triggered while Army's Paeon is being sung, the bard is granted reduced weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay according to the number of stacks accumulated.

Singing the Wanderer's Minuet will display the action's corresponding Song Gauge, indicating the effect's time remaining. If the Repertoire effect is triggered while the Wanderer's Minuet is being sung, the action Pitch Perfect will become available. The potency of Pitch Perfect increases according to the number of Repertoire stacks.
Soul Voice Gauge
The Soul Voice Gauge increases in tandem with Repertoire, and is depleted when using the action Apex Arrow.
Heat Gauge

Performing certain weaponskills will increase the Heat Gauge, and once it is high enough, the action Hypercharge will become available. Using Hypercharge overheats your weapon and allows the use of Heat Blast (acquired at level 35) and Auto Crossbow (acquired at level 52).
Heat Gauge and Battery Gauge

The Battery Gauge accumulates when certain actions are performed and allows the placement of a Rook Autoturret, which will attack your target. It also allows the deployment of an Automaton Queen (acquired at level 80) to fight alongside you.
Elemental Gauge

The Elemental Gauge indicates whether you are under the influence of Astral Fire (after casting a Fire spell) or Umbral Ice (after casting a Blizzard spell). While under the influence of Astral Fire, all Fire spells will have increased potency, but require more MP to cast. While under the influence of Umbral Ice, all Blizzard spells will have no cost, and will recover MP upon striking a target. Furthermore, when maintaining stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice, a spell of the opposite element can be cast at no cost but will deal reduced damage.

Coming under the influence of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice will grant Enochian, and set the lower-right corner of the gauge aglow, indicating its effect is active. Enochian increases the potency of magic attacks, as well as unlocks powerful spells such as Blizzard IV. Enochian fades when Astral Fire or Umbral Ice expires.

Casting Freeze or Blizzard IV grants 3 Umbral Hearts which are represented by the arrows in the gauge's lower-left corner. An Umbral Heart is consumed each time a Fire spell is cast, nullifying the MP cost increase applied by the Astral Fire status.

The Enochian bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained. When the crystal at the bottom of the Elemental Gauge glows pink, you will be under effect of Polyglot, which allows the spells Foul and Xenoglossy (acquired at level 80) to be cast, consuming a crystal.

The Enochian bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained. When one or more crystals at the bottom of the Elemental Gauge glow pink, you will be under effect of Polyglot, which allows the spells Foul and Xenoglossy (acquired at level 80) to be cast, consuming a crystal.
Aetherflow Gauge
Using the action Energy Drain fills the Aetherflow Gauge, which is required to perform certain actions.
Trance Gauge

The Trance Gauge indicates the time remaining for the effects of Aethercharge. Executing this action also grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum, which are used to summon Ifrit-Egi, Topaz Carbuncle, and Emerald Carbuncle respectively.

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance (acquired at level 26).

Upon learning the trait Aethercharge Mastery, the Trance Gauge will indicate the remaining time for the effects of Dreadwyrm Trance. While under its effects, Ruin III is upgraded to Astral Impulse and Outburst is upgraded to Astral Flare. Dreadwyrm Trance also grants Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum.

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance.
Dreadwyrm Aether
Step Gauge

Performing a Standard Step changes the appearance of the Step Gauge and causes you to start dancing. Following the displayed icons to execute steps in the correct order and ending with Standard Finish will increase your damage dealt and that of the party member designated as your Dance Partner. The remaining duration of these effects is displayed beneath the Step Gauge.
Fourfold Feathers
Actions such as Reverse Cascade and Rising Windmill have a chance to grant Fourfold Feathers, which are consumed by Fan Dance and Fan Dance II (acquired at level 50).
Step Gauge

Performing a Technical Step will display four icons on the Step Gauge. Executing the corresponding actions in the correct order followed by Technical Finish increases the damage dealt by you and nearby party members.
Fourfold Feathers and Esprit Gauge

The Esprit Gauge accumulates when you or party members under the effect of Esprit─granted by Standard Finish and Technical Finish─execute weaponskills or cast spells. It is consumed by the action Saber Dance.
Balance Gauge

The Balance Gauge displays the current amount of Black Mana and White Mana a red mage has accumulated. Black Mana is accumulated by casting spells commonly associated with black magic (such as Fire or Thunder), and White Mana by casting spells associated with white magic (such as Aero). There are also some spells and actions that affect both.

When both Black Mana and White Mana reach a certain amount, weaponskills such as Riposte become enchanted and will deal additional damage. If the gap between Black Mana and White Mana accumulation grows too large, the crystal at the top of the gauge will change color, and it will become more difficult to accumulate the lesser of the two.
Powder Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance Royal Guard is in effect, which increases enmity.
Powder Gauge
Performing a combo ending in Solid Barrel or Demon Slaughter (acquired at level 40) adds cartridges to the Powder Gauge, which are expended by Burst Strike and Gnashing Fang (acquired at level 60).

Upon learning the trait Enhanced Dreadwyrm Trance, it is possible to summon Demi-Bahamut to fight at your side. Summoning Demi-Bahamut also grants you Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum. The Trance Gauge will indicate Demi-Bahamut's time remaining on the battlefield, during which Ruin III will be upgraded to Astral Impulse, Outburst to Astral Flare, and Astral Flow to Deathflare.

Upon learning the action Shoha, the Meditation Gauge will be displayed, indicating the number of stacks of Meditation you have accumulated while in combat. Stacks are acquired by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri (acquired at level 90), and are expended after executing Shoha.
The Chakra Gauge indicates the number of chakra currently open. Opening five allows for the execution of Steel Peak.
Master's Gauge

While under the effect of Perfect Balance, executing certain weaponskills will open Beast Chakra─Opo-opo Chakra, Coeurl Chakra, or Raptor Chakra─in accordance with the form normally required to execute them. Opening three of the same Beast Chakra allows the execution of Elixir Field, while three distinct chakra allow the execution of Flint Strike. It is also possible to open the Lunar Nadi and Solar Nadi by executing Elixir Field and Flint Strike respectively. Opening three Beast Chakra and both nadi allows the execution of Tornado Kick.
Master's Gauge and Nadi
特性「必殺技効果アップ」を修得し、「陰陽の闘気」が表示されるように なりました！ 必殺技「天宙脚」を実行すると「陰の闘気」が付与され、「鳳凰の舞」を実行すると「陽の闘気」が付与され、さらに「闘魂」3種が種類を問わず付与された状態になると、最強の必殺技「夢幻闘舞」が実行できます。
Arcana Gauge and Minor Arcana
Minor Arcana can be used to draw either Lord of Crowns or Lady of Crowns, which will appear in the Arcana Gauge.

The Trance Gauge indicates the time remaining for the effects of Aethercharge. Executing this action also grants Ruby Arcanum, which is used to summon Ruby Carbuncle. Upon reaching level 15, Aethercharge will also grant Topaz Arcanum for the summoning of Topaz Carbuncle, and at level 22 Emerald Arcanum for the summoning of Emerald Carbuncle.

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance (acquired at level 26).

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance.

Upon learning the trait Enhanced Summon Bahamut, it is possible to summon Demi-Phoenix to fight at your side. Summoning Demi-Phoenix also grants you Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum. The Trance Gauge will indicate Demi-Phoenix's time remaining on the battlefield, during which Ruin III will be upgraded to Fountain of Fire, Tri-disaster to Brand of Purgatory, and Astral Flow to Rekindle.

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance. Upon learning the trait Elemental Mastery, Astral Flow will also be enhanced by elemental attunement.
Coda

Upon learning the trait Minstrel's Coda, singing the Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant a corresponding Coda. With at least one Coda active, you can execute Radiant Finale.
While under the effect of Astral Fire III or when possessing maximum stacks of Umbral Ice and Umbral Hearts, swapping to the opposite element will allow you to execute Paradox.

Upon learning the trait Cartridge Charge II, a third Cartridge can be stored in the Powder Gauge. Cartridges are added to the gauge by using combo actions such as Solid Barrel or Demon Slaughter (acquired at level 40). Cartridges can then be used to execute several actions such as Burst Strike or Gnashing Fang (acquired at level 60).

The Soul Gauge can be filled via the execution of certain weaponskills, or by defeating enemies afflicted with Death's Design. With sufficient souls stored in the gauge, you can execute actions such as Blood Stalk, Grim Swathe (acquired at level 55), or Gluttony (acquired at level 76).
The Shroud Gauge signifies the strength of your bond with your avatar. When the gauge is sufficiently filled, you can execute Enshroud to temporarily serve as host to your avatar.
The Shroud Gauge can be filled via the execution of certain weaponskills. With sufficient energy stored in the gauge, you can execute Enshroud.
Stacks of Lemure Shroud can be consumed to execute Void Reaping or Communio (acquired at level 90).
Soul Gauge
Death Gauge
Eukrasia
Addersgall Gauge
Eukrasia, when active, can be used to enhance the effects of Dosis, Diagnosis, and Prognosis.

The Addersgall Gauge indicates accumulated stacks of Addersgall, which are restored automatically over time. Addersgall can be consumed to execute actions such as Druochole and Kerachole (acquired at level 50).

The gauge builds stacks of Addersting when the barrier effect of Eukrasian Diagnosis or Eukrasian Prognosis is completely absorbed. Addersting stacks can be used to execute actions such as Toxikon and Toxikon II.
バランスゲージ/マナスタックシンボル

Mana Stacks are gained by executing Enchanted Riposte, Enchanted Zwerchhau, Enchanted Redoublement, or Enchanted Moulinet, and are consumed by casting spells. At maximum stacks, you can cast Verflare and Verholy (acquired at level 70).

Once Enshrouded, the Death Gauge will display the time remaining to play host to your avatar, as well as your stacks of Lemure Shroud, which are consumed to use powerful attacks such as Void Reaping and Communio (acquired at level 90).

The actions Twin Snakes, Demolish (acquired at level 30), and Dragon Kick (acquired at level 50) will grant stacks of Opo-opo Fury, Raptor Fury, or Coeurl Fury. The fury granted is commensurate with the form required for their execution. Other weaponskills that require these forms will consume stacks of fury to deal increased damage.

This timer indicates the duration of Life of the Dragon, which increases damage dealt. Using Geirskogul grants Life of the Dragon, and allows for the execution of more powerful actions such as Nastrond and Stardiver (acquired at level 80).
Using Raiden Thrust or Draconian Fury will sharpen the Firstminds' Focus, up to a maximum of 2 units. Once their focus is fully sharpened, you can execute Wyrmwind Thrust.

The Enochian bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained. When one or more crystals at the bottom of the Elemental Gauge glow pink, you will be under effect of Polyglot, which allows the spells Foul and Xenoglossy (acquired at level 80) to be cast, consuming a crystal.
While under the effect of Astral Fire, casting Fire IV or Flare will grant stacks of Astral Soul. At maximum stacks, you can cast Flare Star.
Astral Gauge

Upon learning the trait Enhanced Summon Bahamut II, it is possible to summon Solar Bahamut to fight at your side. Summoning Solar Bahamut also grants you Ruby Arcanum, Topaz Arcanum, and Emerald Arcanum. The Trance Gauge will indicate Solar Bahamut's time remaining on the battlefield, during which Ruin III will be upgraded to Umbral Impulse, Tri-disaster to Umbral Flare, and Astral Flow to Sunflare.

Each summon, when called forth, will tap into its respective Arcanum, granting you stacks of an elemental attunement, indicated on the Trance Gauge. These elemental attunements will augment Gemshine and Precious Brilliance. Upon learning the trait Elemental Mastery (acquired at level 86), Astral Flow will also be enhanced by elemental attunement.
Vipersight
Serpent Offerings Gauge

Viper engages enemies mainly through the use of three-step combos, their primary combos beginning with either Steel Fangs or Reaving Fangs. The third step can end with one of several weaponskills, each of which grants an effect to strengthen a different combo-ending action. To reach these actions will require the use of specific combo routes. The glow of Vipersight's blades correspond with the outlining of hotbar icons to indicate the next step in a combo. For example, when Steel Fangs is highlighted, the left blade of Vipersight will glow. When Reaving Fangs is highlighted, the right blade of Vipersight will glow. Moreover, the color of the gauge will indicate the step of the combo you've reached. Following these indicators will help ensure the use of combos that finish with a strengthened attack.
The use of certain weaponskills will grant a Rattling Coil, up to a maximum of 2 stacks, indicated by Vipersight. Rattling Coils can be spent to execute Uncoiled Fury.
Upon learning the trait Enhanced Viper's Rattle, a third Rattling Coil can be stored. Rattling Coils are accumulated through the use of certain actions, and can be spent to execute Uncoiled Fury.

The use of certain weaponskills in the execution of combos will serve to fill the Serpent Offerings Gauge. Once sufficient energy has been stored, you can activate Reawaken, which will open the Anguine Tributes on the gauge. These tributes can be used to execute several special weaponskills unique to your reawakened state.

Upon learning the trait Enhanced Serpent's Lineage, a fifth Anguine Tribute will be added to the gauge. Once sufficient energy has been stored, you can activate Reawaken, which will open the Anguine Tributes on the gauge. These tributes can be used to execute several special weaponskills unique to your reawakened state.
Canvases
Palette Gauge

Pictomancer eschews the stave for a brush, painting their imaginings upon a canvas and bringing them to life through magic. Creature Motifs are painted on the Creature Canvas and can be rendered to life through Living Muse, simultaneously granting a depiction of the rendered motif. Assembling Depiction of Pom and Depiction of Wings creates a Moogle Portrait, allowing the execution of Mog of the Ages.

Weapon Motifs are painted on the Weapon Canvas and can be rendered to life through Steel Muse. When a hammer is painted on the canvas, Striking Muse can be performed, allowing the execution of Hammer Stamp.

The Palette Gauge can be accumulated by executing certain aetherhue spells. Once your palette is sufficiently saturated with aether, you can consume a portion of the Palette Gauge to execute Subtractive Palette, which will temporarily alter the properties of your aetherhue spells, significantly enhancing them.

Landscape Motifs are painted on the Landscape Canvas and can be rendered to life through Scenic Muse. When a starry sky is painted on the canvas, Starry Muse can be performed, increasing the damage dealt by self and party members.

Pictomancer eschews the stave for a brush, painting their imaginings upon a canvas and bringing them to life through magic. By utilizing the Creature Canvas, the Weapon Canvas, and the Landscape Canvas, a variety of effects can be produced.

Creature Motifs are painted on the Creature Canvas and can be rendered to life through Living Muse, simultaneously granting a depiction of the rendered motif. Assembling Depiction of Pom and Depiction of Wings creates a Moogle Portrait, allowing the execution of Mog of the Ages.

Weapon Motifs are painted on the Weapon Canvas and can be rendered to life through Steel Muse. When a hammer is painted on the canvas, Striking Muse can be performed, allowing the execution of Hammer Stamp. Landscape Motifs are painted on the Landscape Canvas and can be rendered to life through Scenic Muse. When a starry sky is painted on the canvas, Starry Muse can be performed, increasing the damage dealt by self and party members.

The Palette Gauge and White Paint can be accumulated by executing certain aetherhue spells. Once your palette is sufficiently saturated with aether, you can consume a portion of the Palette Gauge to execute Subtractive Palette, which will temporarily alter the properties of your aetherhue spells, significantly enhancing them. Additionally, White Paint can be spent to execute Holy in White.

Upon learning the trait Enhanced Palette, a splash of White Paint, when accumulated, will be converted to Black Paint upon the execution of Subtractive Palette, which can be spent to perform Comet in Black.

Executing Creature Motif and Living Muse in succession to assemble Depiction of Pom, Depiction of Wings, Depiction of Claw, and Depiction of Fangs creates a Madeen Portrait, allowing the execution of Retribution of the Madeen.

Upon learning the trait Void Soul, weaponskills which cost Lemure Shroud will grant Void Shroud when executed. With sufficient stacks, you can execute actions such as Lemure's Slice and Lemure's Scythe.
Stacks of Lemure Shroud can be consumed to execute Void Reaping or Communio (acquired at level 90).
The action Umbral Soul halts the expiration of Umbral Ice. Reapplying this effect, or casting a spell of the opposite, will cause its expiration to resume.
